item.title: Building low power applications on Espressif chips: Ultra-Low-Power (ULP) coprocessor
item.description: In this article, we’ll start with a quick overview of Ultra Low Power coprocessors (ULPs) in Espressif chips and how they can significantly reduce power consumption in your applications. Then, we’ll walk through a tutorial on how to use ULPs in practice!
